title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-5.2 - Approval required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-5.2 - Approval required

State Regulations

The use of any scaffold of a type not named, specified or
described in this Part (rule) is prohibited unless such scaffold has been
granted a special approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
23-5.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
